item.title: Protocols per plan
item.description: Protocols per planOn this table, you have information about which protocols are available per plan. Free Pro Business Enterprise Availability Paid add-on Paid add-on Paid add-on Paid add-on TCP No No No Yes UDP No No No Yes Minecraft (one app allowed) No Yes Yes Yes SSH (one app allowed) No Yes Yes Yes RDP (one app allowed) No No Yes Yes

item.title: Get started
item.description: Get startedSpectrum is available on all paid plans. Pro and Business support selected protocols only, whereas Enterprise supports all TCP and UDP based traffic. Refer to Configuration options for more configuration details. To create a Spectrum application, you can either use an IP address, a CNAME Record or a Load Balancer. Independently of the method you use, you can create the application through the dashboard or via API. ​​ Create a Spectrum application using an IP address To create a Spectrum application using an IP address, Cloudflare normally assigns you an arbitrary IP from Cloudflare’s IP pool to your application.
